downloadTitle: Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Management Pack for Certificates Monitoring
downloadDescription: This Management Pack for SCOM enables you to monitor PKI certificates and Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs)

downloadFile.name: Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Certificates.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/0/3/e/03e83355-c5cc-49f9-aff4-ac655e14dff7/Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Certificates.msi

detailsSection:
Microsoft Certificates Monitoring Management Pack can be used to:
  • Proactively monitor the expiry of PKI certificates.
  • Monitor validity of PKI certificates through certificate chain verification.
  • Proactively monitor updating of Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs).
  • Receive certificate expiry and verification, and CRL update related warning and errors as Operations Manager alerts.
  • Visualize the certificate and CRLs health and corresponding alerts via the dashboards and alert views including HTML5 dashboard.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft System Center Management Pack for Microsoft Certificates.msi
systemRequirementsSection: This Management Pack requires System Center Operations Manager 2019 or System Center Operations Manager 2022.
installInstructionSection: For detailed instructions on setup, configuration, and monitoring refer to the management pack guide.
